sub_subject.name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
sub_subject.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed) (Science & Nature)

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify trash and where it goes.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name recycling items (paper, plastic).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify point-source vs. non-point source pollution.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the sun and wind as things that don't run out.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name coal and oil as things we dig up.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify nuclear energy.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify a fossil as a rock shaped like a bone or shell.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name dinosaurs as animals from the past.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify amber (fossilized tree sap).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the ground as the Earth's 'crust'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name the 'core' as the hot center of the Earth.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the lithosphere as the hard outer shell.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify rocks as hard things from the ground.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name 'shiny' rocks as crystals or minerals.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify common minerals like quartz or mica.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify that the ground can move (earthquakes).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name volcanoes as mountains that spill hot rock.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the 'Ring of Fire'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify dirt as soil where plants grow.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name worms as helpers in the soil.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify Humus (rotted plants).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify wind and water moving dirt.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name 'Erosion' as the ground washing away.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify landforms made by erosion (canyons, arches).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify hot, cold, and rainy places.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name the desert and the jungle.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the seasons caused by Earth's tilt.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the waves at the beach.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name the tide coming in and out.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify the Gulf Stream (warm water moving).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify clouds and wind.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name rain, snow, and hail.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify Cumulus, Stratus, and Cirrus clouds.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify ways to save water and electricity at home.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Name the job of a "Steward" (taking care of things).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Identify endangered species and habitat loss.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that smoke makes the air dirty.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a landfill or recycling truck.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that we need fuel for cars and lights.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a solar panel.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that fossils are found in the ground.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a fossil imprint.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that the Earth is like a peach with a skin, fruit, and seed.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe pictures of a cut-open Earth.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that we use rocks to build things.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that the Earth has puzzle pieces called plates.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a map showing where volcanoes are.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that soil has dead leaves and rock bits in it.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe different colors of dirt (clay vs. sand).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that water can smooth stones.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe mud flowing in the rain.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that weather happens every day, climate is long-term.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a cactus vs. a fern.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that the moon pulls the water.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a shell left by the tide.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that the sun warms the air.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a thermometer.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that God wants us to keep the earth clean.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Observe the difference between a clean park and a messy one.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the three Rs (Reduce, Reuse, Recycle).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how plastic hurts the ocean.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Categorize types of waste (biodegradable vs. non-biodegradable).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the greenhouse effect and air quality.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the biblical purity laws as a model for hygiene and cleanliness.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the difference between renewable and finite resources.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how fossil fuels are made (ancient plants/pressure).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain geothermal and hydroelectric power.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the responsible use of God's mineral gifts.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize how a fossil forms (rapid burial in mud).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the 'Geologic Column' (rock layers).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain index fossils and their use in dating.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the distinction between data (rock layers) and interpretation (age).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the four main layers: Crust, Mantle, Outer Core, Inner Core.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain that the mantle is hot rock that can move slowly.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the concept of the asthenosphere (plastic layer).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the design of the magnetosphere in protecting the atmosphere.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Sort rocks by color and texture.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the three types of rocks: Igneous, Sedimentary, Metamorphic.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how a mineral (ingredient) is different from a rock (cookie).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how metamorphic rocks are formed by heat and pressure.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the orderly chemical structure of crystal lattices.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the theory of Continental Drift (Pangea).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain why earthquakes happen at the edges of plates.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the difference between the epicenter and focus of an earthquake.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the role of tectonic activity in recycling nutrients and regulating climate.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the components of soil: Minerals, Organic Matter, Air, Water.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain why topsoil is important for farming.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the role of decomposers in nutrient cycling.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the complexity of the soil microbiome.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the difference between Weathering (breaking) and Erosion (moving).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how ice can crack rocks (freeze-thaw).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the process of deposition (dropping sediment).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the importance of soil conservation techniques.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the major climate zones (Tropical, Temperate, Polar).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the effect of the Equator on heat.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the Urban Heat Island effect.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize High Tide and Low Tide.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain that rivers flow into the ocean.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the Coriolis Effect on currents.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the orderliness of the tides as God's decree (Job 38:11).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the Water Cycle (Evaporation, Condensation, Precipitation).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain what air pressure is (weight of the air).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the formation of tornadoes and hurricanes.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend God's sovereignty over the storm (Mark 4).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the concept of "Sustainability" (using without using up).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the "Tragedy of the Commons" (introductory).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the concept of a carbon footprint.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the moral obligation of environmental care.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the process of eutrophication in water bodies.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the "Great Pacific Garbage Patch".

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect consumer habits to waste production.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a windmill with a coal plant.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the pros and cons of green energy (intermittency vs. clean).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the concept of "Peak Oil".

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect geography to resource availability.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a body fossil (bone) with a trace fossil (footprint).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the conditions necessary for fossilization (avoiding decay).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the Law of Superposition (older rocks on bottom).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect the global flood model to the formation of sedimentary layers.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare the thin crust under the ocean vs. thick crust under mountains.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze how scientists use seismic waves to map the interior.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the difference between the liquid outer core and solid inner core.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect the magnetic field to the movement of the outer core.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a rock made from fire (Igneous) vs. water/mud (Sedimentary).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the Rock Cycle (transformation of rock types).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the Mohs Hardness Scale.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect crystal size in igneous rocks to cooling time (intrusive vs. extrusive).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare convergent (crashing) and divergent (pulling apart) boundaries.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the mechanism of seafloor spreading.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the formation of fold mountains (e.g., Himalayas) and trenches.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect subduction zones to volcanic activity.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare sandy soil (drains fast) with clay soil (holds water).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze a soil profile (Horizons O, A, B, C, R).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the soil texture triangle.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect climate to soil type (e.g., rainforest soil is poor).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare mechanical weathering vs. chemical weathering (acid rain).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the agents of erosion: Water, Wind, Ice, Gravity.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the formation of a river meander and oxbow lake.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect vegetation to the prevention of soil erosion.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare weather (out the window) with climate (average).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the Kppen climate classification system.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret ice core data (introductory).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect ocean currents to local climate (e.g., Gulf Stream).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Defend a stewardship approach to climate care without panic.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare salt water density with fresh water.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the Moon's gravitational pull on tides.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret Spring Tides vs. Neap Tides.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect thermohaline circulation (The Great Conveyor Belt) to global climate.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a high-pressure system (sunny) with low pressure (stormy).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze fronts (Cold, Warm, Stationary).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret a weather map (isobars).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect wind speed to pressure gradients.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Compare preservation (no touch) with conservation (wise use).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the impact of human population on natural resources.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the biblical Dominion Mandate as servant-leadership.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Connect resource management to love for neighbor (future generations).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the effectiveness of recycling programs.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the environmental cost of green technology (mining lithium/cobalt).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the 'Cambrian Explosion' and its challenge to gradualism.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the heat sources of the Earth (primordial vs. radiogenic).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the economic importance of specific ores and minerals.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the evidence for Catastrophic Plate Tectonics (CPT) vs. uniformitarian models.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the impact of modern agriculture on soil health (salinization).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the rate of erosion and its implications for geological dating.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the evidence for and causes of climate change.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the impact of El Nio/La Nia.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the accuracy of meteorological models.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the economic vs. ecological trade-offs in conservation.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a proposal for reducing school or home waste.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct an energy strategy for a developing nation.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a critique of deep-time assumptions in radiometric dating.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the evidence for rapid sedimentation vs. slow accumulation.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a scale model of the Earth's layers including composition (SiAl vs. SiMa).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the relationship between mantle convection and surface tectonics.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a classification key for unknown rock samples.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the geological history of a region based on its rock strata.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a predictive model of tectonic activity based on plate boundaries.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the impact of tectonic events on human history.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a plan for soil remediation in damaged land.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the factors of soil formation (Parent material, Climate, Organisms, Topography, Time).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a landscape evolution model (e.g., glacial retreat).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the interaction between chemical weathering and the carbon cycle.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a climate graph (Climograph).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize atmospheric science with historical data.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Earth & Environmental Sciences (The Earth God Formed)
